name: In re Voluntary Assignment of Abner Hoge. Appeal of James Hoge, John Hoge and R. H. Hoge
name_abbreviation: In re Voluntary Assignment of Hoge

judges: Before Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: In re Voluntary Assignment of Abner Hoge. Appeal of James Hoge, John Hoge and R. H. Hoge.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Dean,
This appeal involves the same questions as those raised in No. 49, October term, 1898, opinion this day handed down, ante, p. 527. The same decree therefore is made as in that case, and appeal dismissed at costs of appellant.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Dean,

casebody.head_matter:
In re Voluntary Assignment of Abner Hoge. Appeal of James Hoge, John Hoge and R. H. Hoge.
November 17, 1898:
Argued Oct. 17, 1898.
Appeal, No. 50, Oct. T., 1898, by James Hoge et al., from order of C. P. Greene Co., Jan. T., 1890, No. 7, sustaining exceptions to auditor’s report.
Before Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
